scripts.publish: npx rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:publish; cd ./npm_publish; npm login; npm publish
scripts.patch: npx rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:publish; npm run copyMD; cd ./npm_publish; npm login; npm version patch; npm publish
scripts.minor: npx rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:publish; npm run copyMD; cd ./npm_publish; npm login; npm version minor; npm publish
scripts.major: npx rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:publish; npm run copyMD; cd ./npm_publish; npm login; npm version major; npm publish
